17.ara-name: كتاب الحدود عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Hurairah:That the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "If one of your slave girl commits illegal sexual intercourse, then whip her three times according to the Book of Allah, and if she does it again then sell her, even if it is for a rope made of hair

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي إِقَامَةِ الْحَدِّ عَلَى الإِمَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Establishing Legal Punishments Upon The Slave Girl
